trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents the results of the authorization policies that have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 하는 경우 평가 된 권한 부여 정책의 결과를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Claims are added to an EvaluationContext by authorization policies.
trans-unit.target: 클레임 권한 부여 정책에서는 EvaluationContext에 추가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An authorization policy takes a set of claims, such as those found in a security token, and adds additional claims based on the current set.
trans-unit.target: 권한 부여 정책 등에서 보안 토큰의 클레임 집합을 사용 하 고 현재 집합에 따라 추가 클레임을 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For instance, an authorization policy might evaluate a claim that contains the date of birth and add a claim that states the user is over 21 years old and add an Over21 claim to the EvaluationContext.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 권한 부여 정책 수 생년월일이 포함 하는 클레임을 평가 추가 음 사용자가 21 살이 넘 고 Over21 클레임은 EvaluationContext 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> interface do not authorize users, but they enable the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class to do so.
trans-unit.target: 구현 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>인터페이스에 사용자를 인증 하지 않으면 하지만 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>못하게 하는 클래스</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> 를 사용</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> 하는 클래스

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method for each authorization policy in effect.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>호출은 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>각 권한 부여 정책의 적용에서 방법.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method determines whether additional claims should be added for the user based on the current claims.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>메서드는 현재 클레임을 기반으로 사용자에 대 한 추가 클레임을 추가 해야 하는지 여부를 확인 합니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An authorization policy's <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method may be called multiple times, as claims are added to the EvaluationContext by other authorization policies.
trans-unit.target: 권한 부여 정책의 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>메서드 수 여러 번 호출 수, 다른 권한 부여 정책에서는 EvaluationContext에 클레임을 추가할 때.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When all authorization policies in effect are done, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class makes authorization decisions based upon the final set of claims.
trans-unit.target: 모든 권한 부여 정책 적용 작업을 완료 하는 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>클레임의 최종 집합을 기반으로 권한 부여 결정이 클래스를 사용 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class then creates an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> that contains an immutable set of claims that reflects these authorization decisions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>클래스를 만듭니다는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>이러한 권한 부여 결정을 반영 하는 변경할 수 없는 클레임 집합이 포함 된.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: An evaluation context contains a set of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> objects: an expiration time, which specifies the span of time during which the evaluation context is valid, and a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: 평가 컨텍스트에 집합이 포함 되어 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>개체: 의해 평가 컨텍스트가 유효한는 시간 범위를 지정 하는 만료 시간 및 고유 식별자입니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of claims to the evaluation context.
trans-unit.target: 평가 컨텍스트에 클레임 집합을 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The claims are added to the set of claims contained within the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 포함 된 클레임 집합에 추가 되 고 클레임은 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A>속성.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time the AddClaimSet method is called to add claims to the evaluation context, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.Generation%2A> property should be incremented.
trans-unit.target: 평가 컨텍스트에 클레임을 추가 하는 AddClaimSet 메서드를 호출할 때마다는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.Generation%2A>속성이 증가 해야 합니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.Generation%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that represents the authorization policy that is adding claims to the evaluation context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> 클레임을 평가 컨텍스트에 추가 하는 권한 부여 정책을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> that contains a set of claims.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"> </xref> 클레임 집합이 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> objects that contains the claims added by authorization policies that have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 읽기 전용 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"> </xref> 평가 된 권한 부여 정책에서 추가한 클레임이 포함 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: To add claims to this collection, for example from an authorization policy, use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.AddClaimSet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 권한 부여 정책에서에서이 컬렉션에 대 한 클레임을 추가 하려면 사용 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.AddClaimSet%2A>메서드.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.AddClaimSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> objects that contains the claims added by authorization policies that have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> 평가 된 권한 부여 정책에서 추가한 클레임이 포함 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of times that claims have been added to the evaluation context.
trans-unit.target: 클레임이 평가 컨텍스트에 추가 된 횟수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class uses the Generation property to determine if another evaluation round is required.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>클래스 생성 속성을 사용 하 여 또 다른 평가 필요한 지 여부를 결정 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: Each time an authorization policy calls the `AddToTarget` method to add claims to the evaluation context, the Generation property is incremented.
trans-unit.target: 권한 부여 정책을 호출할 때마다는 `AddToTarget` 메서드를 추가 하는 클레임을 평가 컨텍스트에 생성 속성이 증가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class examines the Generation property after calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method on all authorization policies again.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>호출한 후 생성 속성을 확인 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>메서드를 권한 부여 정책 모두 다시.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: If the Generation property has been incremented during evaluation, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager> class calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method on any authorization policies that returned `false` the last time the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> method was called on that authorization policy.
trans-unit.target: 확인 하는 동안 생성 속성이 증가 하는 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>호출 클래스는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>메서드를 반환 하는 권한 부여 정책 `false` 마지막으로 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>해당 권한 부여 정책에서 메서드가 호출 되었습니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager>

trans-unit.source: The number of times that claims have been added to the evaluation context.
trans-unit.target: 클레임이 평가 컨텍스트에 추가 된 한 횟수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of non-claim properties associated with this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 연결 된 비 클레임 속성의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The classes in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors> namespace that implement the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> interface (authorization policies) add a property named `Identities` to the.<xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.Properties%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 클래스는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors>구현 하는 네임 스페이스는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>라는 속성을 추가 하는 인터페이스 (권한 부여 정책) `Identities` 에.<xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.Properties%2A> 컬렉션.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.Properties%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors>

trans-unit.source: The `Identities` property contains an object of type <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> that contains one or more <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity> instances that represent identity information that is provided by the authorization policies.
trans-unit.target: `Identities` 속성 형식의 개체가 포함 되어 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>하나 이상 포함 하는 <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>권한 부여 정책에서 제공 되는 id 정보를 나타내는 경우.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> that specifies a collection of non-claim properties.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> 비 클레임 속성의 컬렉션을 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the date and time at which this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"></xref> is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 에이 날짜와 시간을 설정 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext"> </xref> 는 유효 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Calling the RecordExpirationTime method multiple times only has an effect if the `expirationTime` parameter has a value that is earlier than the previously specified value.
trans-unit.target: RecordExpirationTime 메서드를 여러 번 호출에 적용 하는 경우는 `expirationTime` 매개 변수는 이전에 지정한 값 보다 이전 값으로 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> value that indicates the date and time when this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"></xref> object is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>나타내는 날짜와 시간을 하는 값이 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext"> </xref> 개체는 더 이상 유효 합니다.</xref:System.DateTime>
